summary: Bruce Wayne is missing. Alfred covers for him while Nightwing and Robin patrol Gotham City in his stead. And a new player, Batwoman, investigates Batman's disappearance.
cast: Jason O'Mara|Yvonne Strahovski|Stuart Allan|Sean Maher|Morena Baccarin|Steve Blum|Gaius Charles|John DiMaggio|Robin Atkin Downes|James Garrett|Ernie Hudson|Christine Lakin|Vanessa Marshall|Matthew Mercer|Geoff Pierson|Jason Spisak|Bruce Thomas|Kari Wahlgren|Travis Willingham
keywords: bruce wayne character|batman character|alfred pennyworth character|james gordon character|lucius fox character
title: Batman: Mala sangre
